articles.title: Patriots’ pass-protection issues are mounting as Drake Maye ties worrisome stat from last year
articles.description:
"We need to be better for Drake," center Garrett Bradbury said

The post Patriots’ pass-protection issues are mounting as Drake Maye ties worrisome stat from last year appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' offensive line struggles lead to increased sacks against quarterback Drake Maye.
Center Garrett Bradbury emphasizes need for improvement to protect Maye effectively.
Local fans express concern over team's performance impacting season outcomes.

articles.title: Downtown Boston hotel settles discrimination complaint after woman was accused of being a man
articles.description:
“They have lied repeatedly,” the couple's lawyer said about Liberty Hotel. The couple are planning to file a civil lawsuit, seeking answers and punitive damage.

The post Downtown Boston hotel settles discrimination complaint after woman was accused of being a man appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Liberty Hotel settled a discrimination complaint involving a woman accused of being a man.
The couple's lawyer claims repeated dishonesty from the hotel regarding the incident.
The couple plans to file a civil lawsuit for punitive damages and answers.

articles.title: Falcons coach walks back ‘clapgate’ accusations after Patriots push back
articles.description:
“I don’t wanna make it a ‘snapgate.' Which I probably already did.”

The post Falcons coach walks back ‘clapgate’ accusations after Patriots push back appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Falcons coach Arthur Smith retracted accusations against the Patriots regarding sideline signals.
Smith acknowledged his comments may have sparked unnecessary controversy in the NFL.
Boston fans remain focused on team integrity amid ongoing discussions about game tactics.

articles.title: Alex Bregman opts out of Red Sox contract, will hit free agency
articles.description:
“I think that impact and influence has rubbed off on his teammates, and by all accounts, he’s loved his time in Boston."

The post Alex Bregman opts out of Red Sox contract, will hit free agency appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Alex Bregman has opted out of his contract with the Boston Red Sox.
Bregman, a key player, will enter free agency after the 2025 season.
His departure may affect team dynamics and fan engagement in Boston.
